summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to expenditure of certain bond proceeds; increasing the 1994 expenditure authority of the Department of Parks and Recreation, and authorizing the use by that department of a portion of the proceeds from the sale of the City's Limited Tax General Obligation Bonds, 1994, for the purpose of paying the outstanding balance owed on the purchase of the real property commonly known as the Evergreen Florist Property at the south end of Lake Union, and authorizing the transfer of a portion of the proceeds from that same bond sale to the Administrative Services Fund as reimbursement for the purchase of certain fire apparatus.
